Supplier.description: Analytical laboratory or supplier issuing the Heavy Metals report (header/footer).

MaterialName.description: Material name for which heavy metals were measured.

MaterialCode.description: Material identifier/code printed on the report.

Lot.description: Batch/lot identifier of the tested sample.

ReportDate.description: Report or test date for the results.

Method.description: Overall analytical technique (e.g., ICP-MS) and digestion type (Full/Partial) if stated.

Metals.description: Per-metal results table with content in ppm and test method/digestion details.

Metal.description: Element name or symbol (e.g., Lead, Pb). Use the label from the table.

ContentPpm.description: Measured concentration in ppm. If '<LOQ', leave numeric empty and express as text in notes if needed.

LOQppm.description: Limit of quantitation in ppm for this analyte.

TestMethod.description: Per-metal method annotation, including digestion type if provided (e.g., 'ICP-MS (full digestion)').
